description.narrative: 6.1 - Communites have capacities to participate in planning, implementing and of whole school development plans., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: PCR6 - Communities participate in school management and demonstrate willingness for school ownership.
